website_summaries.verdict: The perfect mascara for anyone looking to lengthen their lashes.
pros: Mascara gives length and a noticeable curl
Contains beeswax and carnauba wax to keep lashes healthy and conditioned
Cruelty-free and made from natural ingredients
cons: Brush is quite stiff and may be difficult to use for some

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ever.
customer_reviews.text: It is a rich mascara that does not clump or smear. It is super easy to remove with water and does not leave a residue on skin. Extremely gentle for sensitive eyes, even more so than Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Flakes, raccoon eyes two hours later
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it goes on, it's not too heavy and natural looking, but two hours later flaking and raccoon eyes immediately. And that's with only with one application, I don't like a lot of volume. Really disappointed , apparently this is mascara is supposed to be the best of the best as natural goes.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Does not run/ smudge after a long day!
customer_reviews.text: I was having some allergic reaction to a the KUSH mascara and decided to try this. The price is pretty high but after my work days it is still in place, does not clump (the brush has "two" sides in a way that separate lashes while applying so it does not clump), does not irritate my eyes :), and I feel better knowing it is non-toxic with added benefits. I do not have very full eyelashes and this does not exactly add "volume" but gives a more natural look. They do say you can build on the coats, however I just don't. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried countless natural mascaras
customer_reviews.text: This is the only natural mascara out there that has given me the length and volume I want. Make sure you use the dual sided brush properly for best results. Extremely easy to take off. No eye irritation whatsoever. The only downside is that the gold tube starts to chip once you’ve had it for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Lkosi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews, and was really excited to try this. Unfortunately, the mascara flakes off and is definitely not worth the price! 😞
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Tandeski

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Not my fav, started to flake bits under my eyes during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara in the world!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress how much i love this mascara! I rarely leave reviews but for this item i had to! I have sensitive eyes and bo irritation at all! This product makes my lashes the longest and fullest ive ever seen (without looking clumpy) also it has "clean" ingredients, that is just a bonus. I hope you enjoy it as much as i do!! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: pricey but no more itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a clean mascara that doesn't make my eyes itch and become irritated, and I have with this brand. I don't want coal tar and formaldehyde on my eyelashes or in my eyes. One review said that it took two coats, but I find just one coat works for me. It's expensive, but you only get one set of eyes, so I think it's worth it, if you want to keep wearing make-up and not wear toxic crap.
customer_reviews.author: A M Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for volume, not for length
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is a mascara for sensitive eyes that is also cruelty free. Just received so only wore a couple times. Goes on great, does not clump. Definitely gives volume, but not great length if that’s what you are looking for. It also did not bother my very sensitive eyes!
customer_reviews.author: LeahKs

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to makeup and don’t react to this at all. I also love the brush!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Mascara - finally found one that is not gloppy.
customer_reviews.text: I like how clean it goes on. No extra mascara on brush. The brush is a little firm though. Would order again as is good rating on Think Dirty app.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Novinger

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. It’s not full of chemicals like most. It has the most unique brush application. One Side is regular brush & the other side is a comb. It separates your clumps on the comb side. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Ilia nailed it with this one. It lengthens and volumizes my lashes just as well as conventional mascaras. It doesn't smear or smudge after a long day or my workouts. I will say, it wore off a little on a cold/windy day when my eyes were watery, but that is the only small issue I ever had with this product. I've been using it for several weeks, and I don't think I'll ever use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Mascara That Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used many natural mascaras but none of them worked all that well - Ilia darkens and lengthens my lashes and they appear to be fuller as well. I only have a little fall out after a long day with no touch ups (I have oily skin so I feel this is inevitable). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! The brush has two sides to it, which I find super useful: I use the longer side for my upper lashes, which lengthens them a lot, and the shorter side for my bottom lashes, which helps avoid smudging it along my lash line and under my eye. I also love that it's really easy to get off in the evening. And maybe this is a strange thing to like about it, but it also smells good, which is a mascara first for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A.

customer_reviews.title: Defined feathery lashes.
customer_reviews.text: This makes your lashes look so natural and yet feathery, defined and feminine. The wand is very cool. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mascara goes on like the $30+ mascaras from Sephora. It lifts my lashes, doesn't clump, stays put for the most part, but is not waterproof. I will be repurchasing soon as I am running low.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The mascara brush is great so I don't ever get any clumps. Great volume, stays on all day but removes easily at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on so smooth and doesn’t clump up. Lengthens my lashes. No smudges throughout the day (which is saying a lot because we live on an island with 80-90 % humidity most days).
customer_reviews.author: Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre; not memorable
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the hype. This mascara is a bit thick, looks flaky when applied, without any particular benefit (ie my lashes didn't look thicker or longer in any "wow" sort of a way, just darker and gloppy). similar to mediocre drugstore brands. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara that smells good!
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, stays on with no flaking, easy to build up, nice applicator
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Raposa

customer_reviews.title: Great brush and no clumps yet.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was recommended to me, and very glad she did. The brush is very nice and product goes on without clumps. It’s a little pricey but if it lasts then I think it will be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! It performs far better than most toxin-free mascaras, does not smudge or drip, and adds both length & volume. I’m so relieved to have found it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Hinson

customer_reviews.title: best mascara ever.
customer_reviews.text: Thus far,best mascara ever.I actually leave one coat as they look natural, but better. I am one of those boomers,so Ive tried them all while looking for lash in all the wrong places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for quality
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this brand, she picked up at a cosmetic store. I hv had better product at less cost. Don’t waste yr money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: A perfect mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal mascara - length, thickness, NO clumping. It's a new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product many times at Sephora , and this time used amazon to get it faster. I believe this product is fake. It did not go on like it always does and seemed different.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this mascara it doesn't stay On!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in mascara. Before I finished doing my makeup the mascara was flaking on both lids under and over. This was the first and last time I will use this mascara!
customer_reviews.author: sharon schutz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush!! Works better than any other I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Dealsandsteals

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this mascara. Works best with a eye lash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have very sensitive eyes and after years of trying everything! I can wear this brand, all day, no smudge, no tears or allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious lashes, without the toxins
customer_reviews.text: Amazing eyes! Would you love amazing lashes without the harsh and dangerous chemicals. I use 2-3 coats depending on the event or time of day. I can’t believe how long, thick it makes each individual lash. And it comes off easily with my safe eye makeup remover. Try this, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great chemical free mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara!! Besides being a clean and non chemical product, I love that you just wash off so easily with just soap and water!!! Iam still trying to get used to the larger brush applicator but still love the product! It is pricey but I think it's worth it. Highly recommend to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: happyone

customer_reviews.title: Great non-toxic mascara
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of switching out old beauty products for less toxic brands and this one hit the mark. I love the brush and didn't think I would. I prefer the super volume thick mascara typically and this is the opposite, but looks amazing. Helps my lashes look super long. I really like this brand and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Etherington

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but not this time.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before and loved it however when I received this item the mascara was completely clumped on the wand and i can’t apply it. It seems old or like it’s been exposed to air before I received it.
customer_reviews.author: HLDeShong

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: The comb part of the brush really separates the lashes and makes them look full and way more natural than any other mascara I have tried. There are no globs or balls at the end of my lashes like with other mascaras. It also takes less in application so the bottle goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product! I’m on the hunt for a clean mascara. I loved the look when i first applied it but unfortunately I found that it ran and gave me dark circles under my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara ever. Makes lashes long and gorgeous without clumping or flaking and no raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bond

customer_reviews.title: The brush has an hour glass curve that enhances lashes.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps lashes separated and soft all day long. Very easy to remove with lotion mascara remover.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a better experience with the performance of the mascara. I'm finding it has clumps and flakes (particles) when applying it to my lashes everytime I use it! It stays on all day without smudging, thumbs-up! It's a bit pricey for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, actually. It does give you length. I put 4 stars because it doesn't give you volume not as much as would like. If you want some volume, you have to add three more layers
customer_reviews.author: Happy_gal

customer_reviews.title: Smears
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and love this brand, but it tolerates absolutely no touching of your eyes! It smears and rubs allllll over the place. Disappointed because otherwise a win.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose

customer_reviews.title: did not add any volume
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. It did not give me any volume at all. I had to put on like 4 applications to even make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy mascara. Does not clump like some other brands. I usually don't use that much. Applicator is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ranch Lady

customer_reviews.title: lashes lashes lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a clean mascara that actually does what its supposed to do: lengthen and thicken without clumping and flaking and no harmful chemicals. It is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be good for my very sensitive eyes being labeled as “natural” and “clean”. It was not. Made my eyes itchy, red and inflamed after only wearing it 4 hours before showering.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this mascara works on my lashes. It lengthens and separates them beautifully. There is a small brush on one side and a small comb on the other. I love love it! It’s a little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite mascara, the brush is perfect, so tight it truly does lengthen your lashes. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good mascara and no flaking
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good! I’m super impressed with this product and will definitely by again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jairdullo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. Doesn’t clump and really extends lashes
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

product_meta.title: ILIA Limitless Lash Mascara (After Midnight Black | Natural, Cruelty-Free, Clean Mascara)
feature_bullets: A Clean Mascara That Goes Above & Beyond The Expectations Of Any Natural Mascara
Buildable + Flake-Free, Limitless Lash Mascara Lifts, Curls, Lengthens & Adds Just The Right Amount Of Volume For Fuller, Healthy-Looking Lashes
This Lightweight + Nourishing Formula Is Made With A Blend Of Organic Bee & Carnauba Waxes To Weightlessly Condition Each Lash, While Still Keeping Them Lifted Throughout The Day
Gentle Enough For Sensitive Eyes, Easy To Remove

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
